dialogue.speaker: AMY
dialogue.text: You think you'll have time for the water heater this weekend?

dialogue.speaker: AMY
dialogue.text: You're not using the same guy who tried to fix it?

dialogue.speaker: WELLES
dialogue.text: I'm not using him again for anything.  He was worthless.  You have bridge here Saturday?

dialogue.speaker: AMY
dialogue.text: Betty's out of town so we're playing next week.
